mapper.insert: INSERT INTO health(healthno, adminsno, htcno, title, explan, passwd, word, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, rdate) VALUES(health_seq.nextval, #{adminsno}, #{htcno}, #{title}, #{explan}, #{passwd}, #{word}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT healthno, adminsno, htcno, title, explan, recom, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, mp4 FROM health ORDER BY healthno DESC
SELECT healthno, adminsno, htcno, title, explan, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, LOWER(file1) as file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, mp4 FROM health WHERE htcno = #{htcno} ORDER BY healthno DESC
SELECT healthno, adminsno, htcno, title, explan, recom, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, map, youtube FROM health WHERE healthno = #{healthno}
mapper.update: UPDATE health SET map=#{map} WHERE healthno=#{healthno}
UPDATE health SET youtube=#{youtube} WHERE healthno=#{healthno}
